thread.title: "Back to the Future" stars Christopher Lloyd and Michael J. Fox reunite
thread.title_full: "Back to the Future" stars Christopher Lloyd and Michael J. Fox reunite - CBS News

author: Lauren Moraski CBS News
title: "Back to the Future" stars Christopher Lloyd and Michael J. Fox reunite
text:
Doc and Marty are back just in time for Back to the Future Day next week.
12 Photos 12 things you didn't know about "Back to the Future" We relive the '80s classic through pictures as it celebrates 30 years since landing in theaters
In "Back to the Future II," Dr. Emmett Brown (Christopher Lloyd) and Marty McFly (Michael J. Fox) traveled in time to the date Oct. 21, 2015 -- and well, believe it or not, decades have passed since that film was made. And we're on the cusp of that actual date in real life!
So, is the future anything like it was in the 1989 sequel? Lloyd and Fox mull that very question in a new ad for Toyota. It's great to see these guys reunited. Now all we need is a real hoverboard.
Check it out below:
